data.title: Free Belgrade Walking Tours
data.meta_description: Discover Belgrade's hidden gems with our guided walking tours. Explore the rich history, culture, and landmarks of Serbia's capital city. Book your unforgettable journey now!
data.meta_site_name: Free Belgrade Walking Tours | #1 tour in Belgrade - Private tours - Day trips in Serbia - Airport transfers - Hotels in Serbia - DMC Serbia
data.text:
Not to be missed

Walking tours are my favourite way to explore a new city and this one certainly didn't disappoint. Our guide Jovana was informative, friendly and told some great stories, goving an great insight into Serbia and its people. She also answered our questions and gave some good tips. I would defintely recommend joining this tour.

647kirstyc on tripadvisor

Reviewed on July 23rd, 2024

Amazing tour and guide Subotica

Stefan was a fantastic guide and driver for our full day tour of Subotica - The Culture of Vojvodina. The winery was beautiful and not touristy. The highlight was the amazing art nouveau architecture in Subotica and the tour of the synagogue. Stefan made this tour come alive with his incredible knowledge and relaxed personality. The final stop was lunch in a charming country restaurant for local cuisine. I highly recommend this tour

Winstonthedog on tripadvisor
